<js>
function fixNum(n) {
  return String(n)
    .replace(/(\d+)(\d)\d{7}/g, '$1.$2äº¿')
    .replace(/(\d+)(\d)\d{3}/g, '$1.$2ä¸‡')
    .replace(/\.0([ä¸‡äº¿])/g, '$1');
}

JSON.parse(String(result)).ranklist.map(o => {
  var subCateName = o.subCateName ? ' Â· ' + o.subCateName : '';
  var tags = [
    o.categoryName + subCateName,
    o.serialStatus == 0 ? 'è¿è½½' : 'å®Œç»“'
  ];
  if (o.totalClick) {
    tags.push(fixNum(o.totalClick) + 'ç‚¹å‡»');
  }
  if (o.number) {
    tags.push(fixNum(o.number) + 'æœˆç¥¨');
  }

  return {
    id: o.bookId,
    name: o.bookName,
    author: o.authorName,
    intro: o.description,
    kind: tags.join(','),
    last: o.updteChapterName,
    cover: 'http://static.zongheng.com/upload' + o.coverUrl,
    url: 'http://book.zongheng.com/book/' + o.bookId + '.html'
  };
});
</js>

ruleSearch.author: author
ruleSearch.bookList:
<js>
var keyword = baseUrl.match(/keyword=([^=&]+)/)[1];

var searchBooks = JSON.parse(
  String(
    java.ajax(
      'https://m.zongheng.com/h5/ajax/search?h5=1&pageNum=1&field=all&pageCount=5&keywords=' +
        keyword
    )
  )
).searchlist.searchBooks;

var J = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(String(result));

var searchResults = J.select('.search-result-list').toArray();

searchBooks.map(o => {
  return {
    id: o.bookId,
    name: o.bookName,
    author: o.authorName,
    intro: o.description,
    kind: [
      o.serialStatus == 0 ? 'è¿è½½' : 'å®Œç»“',
      String(
        J.select('.bookinfo a')
          .eq(1)
          .text()
      )
    ].join(','),
    last:
      o.updteChapterName + ' Â· ' +
      new Date(o.updateTime).toISOString().replace(/T.*/, ''),
    cover: 'http://static.zongheng.com/upload' + o.coverUrl,
    wordCount: String(
      J.select('.bookinfo span')
        .eq(1)
        .text()
    ),
    url:
      'http://book.zongheng.com/book/' +
      o.bookId + '.html'
  };
});
</js>

JSON.parse(String(result))
  .chapterlist.chapters.filter(o => !o.chapterName.includes('ä½œå“ç›¸å…³'))
  .map(o => {

        bookId +

        o.chapterId +
        '.html',
      vip: o.level > 0
    };
  });
</js>

ruleBookInfo.tocUrl:
<js>
var matcher;
if(result.match(/"catalogUrl":"([^"]+)/)){matcher = result.match(/"catalogUrl":"([^"]+)/)}else if(result.match(/"RawUrl":"([^"]+)/)){matcher=result.match(/"RawUrl":"([^"]+)/)}else{matcher = result.match(/site_chapter_url":"([^"]+)/)};
matcher[1];
</js>
<js>result.replace(/\\/g,'')</js>
<js>if(result.match(/zongheng/)){'https://m.zongheng.com/h5/ajax/chapter/list?h5=1&pageNum=1&pageSize=99999&chapterId=&asc=0&bookId=' + result.match(/bookid=(\d+)/)[1]}

else if
(result.match(/lemonyd/)){'https://biz.lemonyd.com/book/chapter/book/'+result.match(/bid=(\d+)/)[1]+'?volumeIndex=0'}

else if
(result.match(/babk.net/)){result.replace('babk','kknn')}

else if
(result.match(/55xs.com/)){'http://www.55shuba.com/du'+result.match(/(\d+)\/$/)[1]+'/'}

else if
(result.match(/www.13xs.com/)){result.replace(/(\d+).html$/,'')}

else{result}</js>

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
if(baseUrl.match(/zongheng/)){var bookId = baseUrl.match(/bookId=(\d+)/)[1];

JSON.parse(String(result))
  .chapterlist.chapters.filter(o => !o.chapterName.includes('ä½œå“ç›¸å…³'))
  .map(o => {
    return {
      name: o.chapterName.replace(/^æ­£æ–‡\s+/, ''),
      url:
        'http://huayu.zongheng.com/chapter/' +
        bookId +
        '/' +
        o.chapterId +
        '.html',
      vip: o.level > 0
    };
  });
}

else if (baseUrl.match(/lemonyd/)){var bookId = baseUrl.match(/book\/(\d+)/)[1];

JSON.parse(String(result))
  .data.rf.filter(o => !o.name.includes('ä½œå“ç›¸å…³'))
  .map(o => {
    return {
      name: o.name.replace(/^æ­£æ–‡\s+/, ''),
      url:
        'https://biz.lemonyd.com/book/' +
        bookId +
        '/' +
        o.chapterId
   };
  });
}

else {doc=org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result);
list=doc.select("#chapterlist a,.chapterlist dd  a,#kui-book-show a,#list a,.list li,#list dl dd a,#cul a,#chapters-list a,.novel_list a,.dccss a,.book_list a,.mulu ul li a,.listCont dd a,.listmain a,.read a,#list-chapterAll dd a,.chapter a,.section-box ul a,.directoryArea a,.ul_catalog a,.zjlist dd a,.catalog_ls a,#uls li,.list-charts a,#newlist a,.catalogs a,.ml_main a,#readerlist a,tbody td a,.section-box a,.col-sm-3 a,.dirbox a,dl dd a,#yulan li a,.books_li a,.full a");
a=list.toArray().reverse().map(x=>({name:x.text(),
url:x.attr('href')}));

if(baseUrl.match(/ciluzww.com||ttshuba.com/))
{a.reverse()}


}</js>

var rotateLeft = function(lValue, iShiftBits) {

}

var J = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result);
var og = (selector) =>
  J.select('[property="og:' + selector + '"]').attr('content');

var book = {
  name: og('novel:book_name'),
  author: og('novel:author'),
  kind: og('novel:category') + ',' + og('novel:status'),
  latest: og('novel:latest_chapter_name') + ' ' + String(og('novel:update_time')).replace(/(\d+-\d+-\d+).*/, '$1').replace(new RegExp('(Â·s*)?([^\\d-])?(\\d{2})?'+String(new Date().getFullYear()).slice(-2)+'-'),'$1 â€¢ $2'),
  cover: og('image'),
  wordCount: J.select('.blue').eq(0).text(),
  intro: J.select('.bookintro').html(),
  url: og('novel:read_url'),
};

book;
</js>

var J = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result);

  name: og('novel:book_name'),

  kind: og('novel:category') + ',' + og('novel:status'),
  latest: og('novel:latest_chapter_name') + ' ' + String(og('novel:update_time')).replace(/(\d+-\d+-\d+).*/, '$1').replace(new RegExp('(Â·s*)?([^\\d-])?(\\d{2})?'+String(new Date().getFullYear()).slice(-2)+'-'),'$1$2'),
  cover: og('image'),
  intro: String(J.select('#all').html()).replace('[æ”¶èµ·]', ''),
  url: String(baseUrl).replace(/[^\/\d]+((\d+)\d{3})\..*/, '$2/$1/')
};

book;
</js>

ruleBookInfo.init:
<js>
var J = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result);
var og = (selector) =>
  J.select('[property="og:' + selector + '"]').attr('content');

var book = {
  name: og('novel:book_name'),
  author: og('novel:author'),
  kind: og('novel:category') + ',' + og('novel:status'),
  latest: og('novel:latest_chapter_name') + ' ' + String(og('novel:update_time')).replace(/(\d+-\d+-\d+).*/, '$1').replace(new RegExp('(Â·s*)?([^\\d-])?(\\d{2})?'+String(new Date().getFullYear()).slice(-2)+'-'),'$1$2'),
  cover: og('image'),
  intro: J.select('#intro p').eq(0).html(),
};

book;
</js>

<js>
JSON.parse(result).related.map(function(o) {
    var detail = 'https://reader.browser.miui.com/api/v2/book/' + o.id;
    var J = JSON.parse(java.ajax(detail)).data;
    return {
        name: o.title,
        author: o.author,
        tags: [J.bookInfo.bookStatus,J.bookInfo.secondCategoryName].join(','),
        num: J.bookInfo.wordCount + 'å­—',
        latest: J.lastChapter.chapterName.replace(/[\(ï¼ˆ].*[æ±‚æ›´è°¢ä¹å‘æ¨].*[ï¼‰\)]/,'').replace(/\s+/g, ' ') +  String(java.timeFormat(J.lastChapter.updateTime)).replace(/(\d+\/\d+\/\d+).*/,'ï¼ˆ$1ï¼‰'),
        cover: o.image,
        intro: String(o.description).trim(),
        catalogUrl: '/api/v2/chapter/list/' + o.id
    }
}).filter(v =>v.name);
</js>
